resources.string: Are you ready to test your knowledge? \nComputer science, music, geography, science, zoology are only few of our categories that will test your ability to answer. \nBe aware, your wrong answers are not unlimited, just like your time to answer. Good luck.
It is not possible to show global score table because there is no Internet connection !

Next Level: 1

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 2 of 5 questions in 60 seconds!

Nice work!

Next Level: 2

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 2 of 5 questions in 55 seconds!

Excellent!

Next Level: 3

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 3 of 5 questions in 55 seconds!

Super!

Next Level: 4

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 3 of 5 questions in 50 seconds!

Incredible!

Next Level: 5

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 4 of 5 questions in 50 seconds!

You are on fire!

Next Level: 6

To continue to the next level you have to answer correctly in 4 of 5 questions in 45 seconds!

God-like!

Next Level: 7

To finish and earn the 300 point bonus you have to answer correctly in 5 of 5 questions in 40 seconds!
To continue in please select one of the following methods:

only the biggest score of every account per email address in Global score table.
in few questions only, without possibility of publish your score at Global Score Table.

Username must be in email format and your password must be at least 6 characters
Your Nickname must be 3 to 20 characters.
